title: Ep 123: Soul Care with Jen Hatmaker
itunes:title: Ep 123: Soul Care with Jen Hatmaker
itunes:subtitle: Kate learns how to make pasta and recommends the Olive & June manicure box, and Doree finds comfort in Animal Crossing and considers laundry stripping. Then, Jen Hatmaker (Fierce, Free, and Full of Fire: The Guide to Being Glorious You,) joins the ...
description:
Kate learns how to make pasta and recommends the Olive & June manicure box, and Doree finds comfort in Animal Crossing and considers laundry stripping. Then, Jen Hatmaker (Fierce, Free, and Full of Fire: The Guide to Being Glorious You,) joins the podcast to talk about her passion for paper calendars, her evolving relationship with her body, and how she’s digging into soul care during quarantine.


We love to hear from you! To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

  • MOLEKULE - For 10% off your first order, visit molekule.com and enter FOREVER10 at checkout.
  • BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.
